thread.title: Weathering the storm: Two families' financial struggles after Hurricane Harvey

title: Weathering the storm: Two families' financial struggles after Hurricane Harvey
text: Weathering the storm: Two families' financial struggles after Hurricane Harvey Duration: 08:56 SHARE When disaster strikes, having a safety net like flood insurance, a stable income, or savings can mean the difference between getting back on your feet, and living every day among the wreckage. We profile two families in Houston are still recovering from Hurricane Harvey six months after the storm. READ MORE
